const processedHAR=marketDataResponse.volatility?{daily:parseFloat(marketDataResponse.volatility.har_forecast_daily)||0,weekly:parseFloat(marketDataResponse.volatility.har_forecast_weekly)||0,monthly:parseFloat(marketDataResponse.volatility.har_forecast_monthly)||0,intercept:0.001,r_squared:0.8691,mse:0.0001,forecast_1d:parseFloat(marketDataResponse.volatility.har_forecast_daily)||0,forecast_5d:parseFloat(marketDataResponse.volatility.har_forecast_weekly)||0,forecast_22d:parseFloat(marketDataResponse.volatility.har_forecast_monthly)||0,timestamp:marketDataResponse.volatility.timestamp||new Date().toISOString()}:harResponse;setMarketData(processedMarketData);setVolatilityData(processedVolatility);setSignals(signalsResponse.signals||signalsResponse||[]);setHarParams(processedHAR);setHistoricalData(historicalResponse.data||historicalResponse||[]);setLastUpdate(new Date());setLoading(false);}catch(err){console.error('Error fetching data:',err);setError(err.message||'Failed to fetch data');setLoading(false);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchData();// Refresh data every 30 seconds
